name: Viewpoints
description:
Viewpoints - 3D puzzle game, whose goal is to reach the blue glowing cube. In words, everything is simple, although it is not. For successful passing you have to use 2 measurements at once. You will see 5 different points of view, each of them will be true, but only for itself.

Features:
  • 7.5k+ achievements
  • 20+ level
  • Trading cards
  • Full controller support
